item.title: About Me!
item.description: Hello world! My name is Haroon Akram. I am a recent graduate in Cyber Security. I am currently looking for a role as a security analyst. I’ll be using this website to showcase my interests and endeavours I may take in the future. Links You can check me out on these platform too: LinkedIn TryHackMe
